byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Osservatore Romano revs Pope's peace efforts
snippet: ROME, Sept. 2--One ray of light in the whole dark year of war, writes today's Osservatore Romano in its summary of Vatican activity, in that period was the "work of the Vicar of Christ representing the Prince of Peace."...

headline.main: POPE'S PEACE BIDS MARK YEAR OF WAR; His Speeches and Messages on Subject Are Reviewed by Osservatore Romano EFFORTS STILL CONTINUE Pontiff Said to Bend All His Energies to Limit Conflict and Avert Suffering

lead_paragraph: ROME, Sept. 2--One ray of light in the whole dark year of war, writes today's Osservatore Romano in its summary of Vatican activity, in that period was the "work of the Vicar of Christ representing the Prince of Peace."
